languages.text: {n}Абеляр пару секунд приглаживает бороду, а затем с явной неохотой отвечает:{/n} "Обнаружение {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g} обеспечит ваш протекторат тем, без чего не способен работать ни один ваш слуга — пропитанием. Не стоит недооценивать важность простейшего снабжения — взгляните хотя бы на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в его нынешнем прискорбном состоянии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр пару секунд приглаживает бороду, а затем с явной неохотой отвечает:{/n} "Обнаружение {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g} обеспечит ваш протекторат тем, без чего не способен работать ни один ваш слуга — пропитанием. Не стоит недооценивать важность простейшего снабжения — взгляните хотя бы на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в его нынешнем прискорбном состоянии".

languages.text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр пару секунд приглаживает бороду, а затем с явной неохотой отвечает:{/n} "Обнаружение {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g} обеспечит ваш протекторат тем, без чего не способен работать ни один ваш слуга — пропитанием. Не стоит недооценивать важность простейшего снабжения — взгляните хотя бы на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в его нынешнем прискорбном состоянии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard pats his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the Agri-World will supply your trade empire with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supply should not be underestimated. Just look at Footfall in its current pitiful state."

The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at Footfall in its current pitiful state."

The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at Footfall in its current pitiful state."

{n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

{n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

languages.text: {n}Abelard se mesa la barba durante unos segundos antes de responder con tono dubitativo:{/n} «Recuperar el {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} abastecerá a su protectorado con algo que todos sus siervos necesitan: sustento. No debe subestimar la importancia de los suministros básicos: basta con mirar el lamentable estado actual de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} para entenderlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se mesa la barba durante unos segundos antes de responder con tono dubitativo:{/n} «Recuperar el {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} abastecerá a su protectorado con algo que todos sus siervos necesitan: sustento. No debe subestimar la importancia de los suministros básicos: basta con mirar el lamentable estado actual de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} para entenderlo».

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德捻着胡须，过了几秒，他犹豫不决地回答着你的问题。{/n}“如果能重新夺回{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}，您的领土与您的仆人都将得到不可缺少的东西，那就是给养。绝对不能低估基本物资的重要性，您只要看看{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}目前的惨状，就能明白这一点。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德捻着胡须，过了几秒，他犹豫不决地回答着你的问题。{/n}“如果能重新夺回{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}，您的领土与您的仆人都将得到不可缺少的东西，那就是给养。绝对不能低估基本物资的重要性，您只要看看{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}目前的惨状，就能明白这一点。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは少しの間自分の髭をなで、ためらいがちに答える。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}を再発見できれば、どの従者にもなくてはならないもの、つまり食糧を保護領に供給できます。基本的な必需品の重要性を低く見てはいけません。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の今の悲惨な状況をご覧ください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは少しの間自分の髭をなで、ためらいがちに答える。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}を再発見できれば、どの従者にもなくてはならないもの、つまり食糧を保護領に供給できます。基本的な必需品の重要性を低く見てはいけません。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の今の悲惨な状況をご覧ください」

languages.text: {n}Abelard streicht sich einige Sekunden durch den Bart und antwortet dann zögernd:{/n} "Die Wiederentdeckung der {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g} würde Euer Protektorat mit etwas versorgen, ohne das keiner Eurer Diener auskommt – Nahrung. Man sollte die Wichtigkeit der Grundbedürfnisse niemals unterschätzen. Seht Euch doch nur an, in welchem beklagenswerten Zustand {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} sich aktuell befindet."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard streicht sich einige Sekunden durch den Bart und antwortet dann zögernd:{/n} "Die Wiederentdeckung der {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g} würde Euer Protektorat mit etwas versorgen, ohne das keiner Eurer Diener auskommt – Nahrung. Man sollte die Wichtigkeit der Grundbedürfnisse niemals unterschätzen. Seht Euch doch nur an, in welchem beklagenswerten Zustand {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} sich aktuell befindet."

languages.text: {n}Abélard caresse sa barbe pendant quelques secondes avant de vous donner une réponse hésitante :{/n} « En localisant l'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g}, vous fournirez à votre protectorat quelque chose dont aucun de vos serviteurs ne peut se passer : de la nourriture. Il ne faut surtout pas sous-estimer l'importance des ressources fondamentales. Regardez donc le triste état de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} pour en avoir la preuve. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard caresse sa barbe pendant quelques secondes avant de vous donner une réponse hésitante :{/n} « En localisant l'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g}, vous fournirez à votre protectorat quelque chose dont aucun de vos serviteurs ne peut se passer : de la nourriture. Il ne faut surtout pas sous-estimer l'importance des ressources fondamentales. Regardez donc le triste état de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} pour en avoir la preuve. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, birkaç saniyeliğine sakalını sıvazlayıp ardından tereddütle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Zirai dünyayı{/g} yeniden keşfetmek, protektoranızdaki hizmetkârlarınıza olmazsa olmaz bir şey, yani gıda temin edecek. Temel ihtiyaçların önemi küçümsenmemelidir. Bunu görebilmek için {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'ın{/g} hâlihazırdaki içler acısı hâline bakmanız kâfi."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard strokes his beard for a few seconds before giving a hesitant reply:{/n} "Rediscovering the {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g} will supply your protectorate with something none of your servants can do without — sustenance. The importance of basic supplies should not be underestimated. Just look at {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} in its current pitiful state."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard birkaç saniyeliğine sakalını sıvazlıyor ve ardından çekingen bir yanıt veriyor:{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Tarım dünyası{/g}nı yeniden keşfetmek protektoranızdaki hizmetkârlarınıza olmazsa olmaz bir şey temin edecek: Gıda. Temel ihtiyaçların önemi küçümsenmemelidir. Bunu görebilmek için {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'ın hâlihazırdaki içler acısı hâline bakmanız kâfi."
